thread.title: Linda Craven

author: Linda Craven
title: Linda Craven
text: I met Lynn at the beginning of 2010 when I moved to Carrollton, Georgia from North Carolina. I had just purchased a house and needed help changing over my Nationwide coverage from NC to Georgia. Lynn had me taken care of in no time and with coverage on my house and car that worked for me. I have had to call on Lynn numerous times with questions, or advice, over the past six years. She has always been kind, considerate and helpful especially recently when I had a car accident. I called Lynn first and in no time she had me connected with other wonderful Nationwide folks who helped me maneuver through one of the worst times in by life. Lynn is one of those people you want "on your side".
